title: Work
credit_line: William Frew Memorial Purchase Prize, Given by Mr. and Mrs. Henry Oliver, Jr.
provenance_text:
Akira Hasegawa [1925-?], Hakodate-shi, Hokkaido, Japan [1]; purchased from the artist by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, 1958.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was exhibited (no. 202) in "The 1958 Pittsburgh Bicentennial International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, December 1958 - February 1959.
